__TOC__


This initiative aims to help teams and individuals contact local suppliers of computer hardware to:
* Make them aware of the existence of Ubuntu;
* Make them aware of Ubuntu's <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/partners/hardwareprogramme|Hardware Certification Program]]</nowiki>; 
* Make them aware of Ubuntu's other <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/partners/|Partner Programs]]</nowiki>; 
* Encourage them to consider supplying hardware with <nowiki>[[UbuntuPre-installed|Ubuntu pre-installed]]</nowiki> (while letting them know about Ubuntu's OEM installer)
* Failing that, encourage them to provide customers with the option to have no operating system pre-installed.

See Also: <nowiki>[[..-UbuntuInStores|Ubuntu In Stores]]</nowiki>
